attributes.action: Lower Insurance Premiums for Teens and Young Adults.
attributes.additional_details: Newly passed drivers are having to pay ridiculous amounts of money just to insure their cars, having just passed you test, realistically a new driver should be fresher on the Highway Code and having passed are clearly capable of driving correctly and safely.
attributes.background: I believe that newly passed drivers should not have to pay £1000+ for car insurance, I understand being newly passed means that there is a higher chance of an accident happening compared to someone with more experience. But most newly passed drivers are on minimum wage and having to pay £1000 +.
